title: Teacher Professional Development Program for Strengthening Student-Centered E-Learning Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic e-learning tools and experience in secondary mathematics education
context.additional_context: Educational Course Focused on Smartphone-Based Learning Activity Design and Asynchronous Collaboration

learning_goals: Develop educational scenarios by applying six principles of student-centered e-learning activity design based on mathematics curriculum.
Conduct a collaborative design process with peer teachers following the Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
Establish a learning effectiveness measurement plan using formative assessment tools optimized for smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
